description: Detects suspicious base64 encoded and obfuscated "LOAD" keyword used in .NET "reflection.assembly"
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious Encoded And Obfuscated Reflection Assembly Load Function Call
query: process.command_line.text:("*OgA6ACgAIgBMACIAKwAiAG8AYQBkACIAKQ*" OR "*oAOgAoACIATAAiACsAIgBvAGEAZAAiACkA*" OR "*6ADoAKAAiAEwAIgArACIAbwBhAGQAIgApA*" OR "*OgA6ACgAIgBMAG8AIgArACIAYQBkACIAKQ*" OR "*oAOgAoACIATABvACIAKwAiAGEAZAAiACkA*" OR "*6ADoAKAAiAEwAbwAiACsAIgBhAGQAIgApA*" OR "*OgA6ACgAIgBMAG8AYQAiACsAIgBkACIAKQ*" OR "*oAOgAoACIATABvAGEAIgArACIAZAAiACkA*" OR "*6ADoAKAAiAEwAbwBhACIAKwAiAGQAIgApA*" OR "*OgA6ACgAJwBMACcAKwAnAG8AYQBkACcAKQ*" OR "*oAOgAoACcATAAnACsAJwBvAGEAZAAnACkA*" OR "*6ADoAKAAnAEwAJwArACcAbwBhAGQAJwApA*" OR "*OgA6ACgAJwBMAG8AJwArACcAYQBkACcAKQ*" OR "*oAOgAoACcATABvACcAKwAnAGEAZAAnACkA*" OR "*6ADoAKAAnAEwAbwAnACsAJwBhAGQAJwApA*" OR "*OgA6ACgAJwBMAG8AYQAnACsAJwBkACcAKQ*" OR "*oAOgAoACcATABvAGEAJwArACcAZAAnACkA*" OR "*6ADoAKAAnAEwAbwBhACcAKwAnAGQAJwApA*")
